metadata.Title: CVE-2017-8394 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low
metadata.Description: The Binary File Descriptor (BFD) library (aka libbfd), as distributed inGNU Binutils 2.28, is vulnerable to an invalid read of size 4 due to NULLpointer dereferencing of _bfd_elf_large_com_section. This vulnerabilitycauses programs that conduct an analysis of binary programs using thelibbfd library, such as objcopy, to crash.

criterions.comment: binutils: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
